job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback and question crafting for AI training, which aligns more with data annotation or quality assurance than core AI engineering roles.

phrases: help train AI large language models
engaging with these models as they learn to code
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training or interacting with AI models to improve their performance, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically in the context of generative AI.

phrases: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: The role requires coding expertise and involves tasks like crafting questions and evaluating code, which are activities that leverage software development skills, even if not directly building applications. The description also mentions 'experienced software engineer' as a prerequisite.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This phrase suggests that the role is open to individuals who may not have prior AI experience, implying a need for learning and adaptability to pick up the necessary skills on the job.
The freelance and flexible hours nature of the role implies a need for self-direction, initiative, and ownership of one's work, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' skill.
